DataUsePurpose.name: DataUsePurpose
DataUsePurpose.description: Represents the reason for contacting a prospect or customer, such as for billing, marketing, or surveys

CanDataSubjectOptOut.description: Required. Indicates whether the customer can decline contact for the described purpose.

Description.description: Indicates the purpose for contacting a customer.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LegalBasisId.description: Identifies the legal basis record associated with the data use purpose.

Name.description: Required. Identifies the reason for contacting a customer. For example, billing or marketing.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

PurposeId.description: The ID of an object containing data specific to the data use purpose.
